item.title: 卡冈亚戈认为南非通胀下降将降低国家风险
item.description: 储备银行行长莱塞特贾-克加亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，降低南非的通胀率将减少物价增长的波动性和国家风险。【原文：Lowering South African inflation would reduce price-growth volatility and country risk, Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said.】

item.title: 乔治华盛顿大学成为特朗普针对的最新一所大学
item.description: 美国司法部称，乔治华盛顿大学在去年支持巴勒斯坦学生的抗议活动中违反了联邦民权法，成为特朗普政府对美国大学行使权力的最新目标。【原文：The Department of Justice said George Washington University violated federal civil rights law during pro-Palestinian student protests last year, making it the latest target in the Trump administration’s campaign to exert power over US colleges.】

item.title: 美国收成创纪录，玉米下跌幅度超预期
item.description: 在美国农业部上调已经创纪录的美国玉米收成展望后，芝加哥玉米期货跌至近一年来的最低水平。【原文：Chicago corn futures fell to the lowest level in nearly a year after the US Department of Agriculture raised its already record-large outlook for the American harvest.】

item.title: 嘉吉公司收入在农作物价格下跌中跌至四年来最低点
item.description: 嘉吉公司的收入降至四年来的最低点，这家美国最大的私营公司在农作物价格下降和美国牛群萎缩的情况下继续进行重组。【原文：Cargill Inc.’s revenue declined to the lowest in four years as the largest private company in the US continues to restructure in the face of declining crop prices and a shrinking American cattle herd.】

item.title: 特朗普选中的美国劳工统计局领导人建议暂停发布月度就业报告
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑选的劳工统计局领导人安东尼（EJ Antoni）建议暂停该机构的月度就业报告，只公布季度数据，直到数据收集问题得到纠正。【原文：EJ Antoni, President Donald Trump’s pick to lead the Bureau of Labor Statistics, has suggested suspending the agency’s monthly jobs reports and publishing only quarterly numbers until issues with data collection are corrected.】

item.title: 米莱的外汇改革引发 2020 年以来最严重的企业违约潮
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的改革为阿根廷混乱的外汇市场带来了稳定，也赢得了投资者的赞誉。但改革也助长了自大流行病以来最严重的企业连续违约。【原文：Javier Milei’s reforms have brought stability to Argentina’s chaotic foreign exchange market and praise from investors. But the overhaul is also fueling the worst streak of corporate defaults since the pandemic.】

item.title: 据说 Cenovus 公司正在与土著团体商谈 MEG 竞标事宜
item.description: Cenovus Energy Inc. 正与加拿大土著团体商谈联合收购油砂生产商 MEG Energy Corp.【原文：Cenovus Energy Inc. is in talks with Indigenous groups in Canada to jointly buy MEG Energy Corp., an oil sands producer that faces an unsolicited $4 billion takeover bid from a Canadian oil tycoon.】

item.title: 安大略省教师削减 56% 的美元风险敞口，因为卢尼上涨
item.description: 由于加拿大货币兑美元汇率飙升，安大略教师退休金计划在今年上半年将美元风险敞口降低了 56%。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan cut its exposure to the US dollar by 56% in the first half of the year as Canada’s currency surged against the greenback.】

item.title: 多米诺餐厅将通过出售资产抵押证券融资 13.2 亿美元以偿还旧债
item.description: 多米诺比萨公司（Domino's Pizza Inc.【原文：Domino’s Pizza Inc. has kicked off a $1.32 billion bond sale backed by most of its assets to refinance its debt.】

item.title: 南非与安赛乐米塔尔就关键工厂的命运进行谈判
item.description: 南非政府正与安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）的当地部门进行危机谈判，以决定该公司亏损的建筑钢厂的命运。【原文：South Africa’s government is locked in crisis talks with the local unit of ArcelorMittal SA to decide the fate of the company’s loss-making construction-steel mill, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Perplexity 出价 345 亿美元收购谷歌 Chrome 浏览器
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Perplexity 表示，它已正式提出以 345 亿美元的价格收购谷歌的 Chrome 浏览器，以应对搜索巨头在反垄断诉讼中可能提出的要求。【原文：AI startup Perplexity said it made a formal offer to acquire Google’s Chrome browser for $34.5 billion, in anticipation of requirements that may be imposed on the search giant in antitrust proceedings.】

item.title: Venture Global 首次公开募股大败，收入超预期后仍不改其初衷
item.description: 液化天然气出口商 Venture Global Inc. 公布第二季度财报后，该公司今年首次登陆美国公开市场的最差表现的桂冠没有受到影响。【原文：Venture Global Inc.’s crown as worst US public markets debutant this year is undented after the liquefied natural gas exporter reported second quarter earnings.】

item.title: 方点聘请金属交易商拓展实物铜业务
item.description: 投资公司 Squarepoint Capital LLP 雇用交易员从世界各地采购和销售金属，这是该公司大举进军实物商品交易的最新迹象。【原文：Investment firm Squarepoint Capital LLP hired traders to source and sell metals from all over the world, the latest sign of the firm’s major push into physical commodity trading.】

item.title: 股票市场动荡不安，CDPQ 退休金上半年增长 4.6
item.description: 魁北克储蓄与配售银行（Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec）报告称，在股市动荡和实物资产承压的情况下，今年上半年的回报率为 4.6%。【原文：Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec reported a 4.6% return for the first half of the year amid turmoil in equity markets and pressures on real assets.】

item.title: 肯尼亚连续第七次下调关键利率以促进经济发展
item.description: 肯尼亚中央银行连续第七次下调基准利率，以促进私营部门贷款和经济增长，因为通货膨胀率仍在目标范围内。【原文：The Central Bank of Kenya cut its benchmark interest rate for the seventh time in a row to boost private-sector lending and economic growth as inflation remains within target.】

item.title: 墨西哥在经济逆风中任命新的财政部副部长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，墨西哥总统正准备提名玛丽亚-德尔-卡门-博尼利亚（Maria del Carmen Bonilla）担任财政部副部长。【原文：Mexico’s president is preparing to nominate Maria del Carmen Bonilla as deputy finance minister after five months without anyone in the ministry’s powerful No. 2 post, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 软件股因担心人工智能颠覆而下挫，数十亿美元化为乌有
item.description: 越来越多的人担心，人工智能工具可能很快就会颠覆全球最大的软件企业，这引发了整个行业的抛售潮。【原文：Growing worries that artificial intelligence tools could soon disrupt the world’s biggest software businesses are sparking a selloff across the sector.】

item.title: 纳亚拉面临制裁，印度向中国运送稀有柴油
item.description: 在最新一轮欧盟制裁之后，与俄罗斯有关联的纳亚拉能源公司（Nayara Energy）的成品油出口陷入困境。【原文：A cargo of Indian diesel is heading to China, in what would be first such shipment since 2021, with oil product exports from Russia-linked Nayara Energy in a state of limbo following the latest round of European Union sanctions.】

item.title: 特朗普颠覆贸易，阿尔伯塔省加强加墨能源关系
item.description: 加拿大主要产油省的领导人访问了墨西哥，希望帮助重塑与拉美第二大经济体的关系，特别是促进能源项目。【原文：The leader of Canada’s main oil-producing province visited Mexico in a bid to help reset relations with Latin America’s second-largest economy, with a particular eye to promoting energy projects.】

item.title: 生育初创企业 Gameto 筹集 4400 万美元，在美国测试冷冻卵子疗法
item.description: 致力于妇女健康干细胞疗法的生物技术公司Gameto Inc.已筹集到4400万美元的风险投资，用于资助其旨在改善冷冻卵子体验的产品的临床试验。【原文：Gameto Inc., a biotech company working on stem-cell therapies for women’s health, has raised $44 million in venture capital to help fund a clinical trial for its product that aims to improve the egg-freezing experience.】

item.title: 杜权将承认与 Terra 崩塌有关的指控
item.description: Terraform Labs Pte.联合创始人杜权（Do Kwon）表示，他将在美国一宗欺诈案中认罪，该案与 2022 年 TerraUSD 稳定币价值 400 亿美元的崩盘有关。【原文：Terraform Labs Pte. co-founder Do Kwon said he will plead guilty to charges in a US fraud prosecution tied to the $40 billion collapse of the TerraUSD stablecoin in 2022.】

item.title: 水母导致的法国核电站停运时间正在延长
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）称，因水母堵塞水泵而停运的两个反应堆的停运时间将比最初计划的更长。【原文：Electricite de France SA said two reactors which were taken offline due to jellyfish clogging up a pump would be out of service for longer than initially planned.】

item.title: 捷克国防部批准购买 44 辆豹式坦克的计划
item.description: 捷克国防部批准了一项计划，以 328 亿克朗（16 亿美元）的价格从德国购买首批 44 辆豹 2A8 坦克。【原文：The Czech Defense Ministry approved a plan to buy an initial 44 tanks Leopard 2A8 from Germany for 32.8 billion koruna ($1.6 billion).】

item.title: 智利正在调查阿尔贝马尔锂电厂事故
item.description: 知情人士称，Albemarle 公司上周在智利的锂加工厂发生了一起事故，目前正在对此进行调查。【原文：Albemarle Corp. had an incident at its lithium- processing plant in Chile last week, which is the subject of an investigation, said people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储施密德称政策立场目前仍合适
item.description: 堪萨斯城联邦储备银行行长杰夫-施密德（Jeff Schmid）表示，他赞成暂时按兵不动，以防止强劲的经济活动增加通胀压力。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City President Jeff Schmid said he favors keeping interest rates on hold for the time being to prevent robust economic activity from adding to inflation pressures.】

item.title: 旅游度假公司上调盈利预期，TUI 股价大涨
item.description: TUI AG 大涨 5%，因为这家德国包价假日旅游运营商上调了本财年的业绩指导。【原文：TUI AG surged as much as 5% after the German package-holiday operator raised its guidance for the financial year.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴尔金称就业与通胀风险之间的平衡尚不明确
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）表示，美国经济走向的不确定性正在降低，但目前仍不清楚央行应将更多精力放在控制通胀还是促进就业市场上。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin said uncertainty over the direction of the US economy is decreasing, but it’s still unclear whether the central bank should concentrate more on controlling inflation or bolstering the job market.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州 "光明线 "列车以 15%的速度碾压 9.85 亿美元的债务
item.description: 根据彭博社汇编的数据，连接奥兰多和迈阿密、陷入困境的私营铁路公司 Brightline Florida 正在偿还 9.85 亿美元的债务，收益率为 14.89%，票面利率为 10%。【原文：Brightline Florida — the struggling private rail line connecting Orlando to Miami — is rolling over $985 million of debt with a 14.89% yield and a 10% coupon, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚 "数字游民 "项目创下收入纪录
item.description: 据爱沙尼亚政府称，爱沙尼亚一项针对数字游民的计划在今年上半年带来了创纪录的 6800 万欧元（7920 万美元）税收和费用。【原文：An Estonian initiative catering to digital nomads brought in a record €68 million ($79.2 million) in tax revenue and fees in the first half of the year, according to the government.】

item.title: 默克集团利用高等级债券市场为收购 SpringWorks 提供资金
item.description: Merck KGaA 在举行投资者电话会议一天后，于周二进入投资级市场，为其 39 亿美元收购 SpringWorks Therapeutics Inc.【原文：Merck KGaA is in the investment-grade market Tuesday, a day after holding investor calls, to help fund its $3.9 billion acquisition of SpringWorks Therapeutics Inc.】
